name: One Button Roguelite
description:
One Button Roguelite is all the fun of procedural progression, randomly spawned items, and challenging gameplayer, all controlled by only ONE BUTTON! Can you beat the game?

The current game contains: 1 Playable character, 1 World, 1 Boss, 5 Enemy types, 20 Randomly selected stages, and 26 Unique Items to find! All of these will be expanded upon in further updates!

Gameplay Controls:

Press Spacebar = Jump

Release Spacebar = Attack

Non-Gameplay Controls:

R = Reset

PageUp = Increase Game Window Size

PageDown = Decrease Game Window Size

This game is currently under development and a lot of the art assets are placeholders as of right now. Its more of a proof of concept that may be worked on until fruition.

-Smidge7-
